Larry Tu

San Francisco, CA | larrytu327@gmail.com

After over 16 years of experience in social work, direct service, and coaching, I am bringing my deep-rooted passion for solving systemic problems at a human level to software engineering. I am a full stack software engineer with a client and customer-centered approach, passionate about helping others through making technology more accessible.

Projects

Uno Card Game

JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Designed and incorporated a responsive user interface for a vanilla JavaScript two person Uno card game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Optimized game performance and minimized resource usage by implementing efficient algorithms.

Winstagram

JavaScript, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Mongoose

Created a full CRUD image sharing application using MongoDB, ExpressJS, JavaScript, and NodeJS. Implemented user authentication and authorization as a part of the applicationâ€™s functionality. Established front end and back end and hosted with Netlify.

Restaurant Recommendations

React, Bootstrap, CSS, JSON, Node.js

Restaurant recommendations applicaiton that allows users to see list of restaurants in San Francisco that have been recommended by users who have visited the site before. The user will be able to browse through a list of restaurants in the yelp API and add that restaurant to the list of recommended restaurants. On the recommended list page users will be able to create there own restaurant to recommend by entering its required information in the input field with full CRUD capability. Technologied used include React, JSON, Bootstrap, and Node.js.

Recipe App

Django, JavaScript, CSS, Postgresql, Neon

A full stack application with CRUD ability, created with Django, CSS, JavaScript, Postgresql with a Neon database. This application allows users to create/edit/delete recipes while also allowing them to add ingredients from different recipes to a grocery shopping list.

ConnectEd

Django, JavaScript, CSS, Bootstrap, Postgresql, Neon

A full-stack application that uses Django (front and back end), JavaScript, CSS, Bootstrap, Postgresql, and Neon database. ConnectEd is a platform designed to foster seamless communication, collaboration, and shared success among parents, teachers, and students. Through ConnectEd, parents can stay informed about their child's academic progress, receive timely updates, and communicate directly with teachers. Teachers can easily share important information, assignments, and announcements with both parents and students. Students can actively participate in discussions, access learning resources, and connect with their peers. With ConnectEd, the educational experience becomes interactive, engaging, and inclusive, ensuring that everyone involved is connected and empowered to achieve their fullest potential.
